title: Table Section Fields

fields.label: Table Columns
fields.name: columns
fields.instructions: Add one item per column. Each column has a header and its own list of cells (one per row). Column-based structure makes it easy to style or popout a whole column.

sub_fields.label: Whole Column Background Color
sub_fields.name: column_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Optional. Header + all body cells in this column.

sub_fields.label: Cells
sub_fields.name: cells
sub_fields.instructions: One cell per row (add same number of cells in each column for a uniform table).

fields.label: Transpose table
fields.name: transpose_table
fields.instructions: When OFF (default): header row at top (e.g. FEATURE | BENEFIT), then one row per pair. When ON: one displayed row per column (all features in one row, all benefits in another).

fields.label: Popout Column
fields.name: popout_column
fields.instructions: Visually highlight one column (e.g. border or shadow).

fields.label: Column to Popout
fields.name: popout_column_index
fields.instructions: Which column to popout (1 = first column).

fields.label: Odd Row Background
fields.name: odd_row_bg
fields.instructions: Apply a background color to odd rows (1st, 3rd, 5th…).

fields.label: Even Row Background
fields.name: even_row_bg
fields.instructions: Apply a background color to even rows (2nd, 4th, 6th…).

description: Column-based table: each column has header + its cells; popout and column colors apply per column.
